body.p: An issue has been seen during the execution of the playbook playboooks/config_networking.yml when using RHEL 7.4.
body.codeblock: TASK [Change hostname with FQDN] fatal: [<hostname>]: UNREACHABLE! => {"changed": false, "msg": "Failed to connect to the host via ssh: ssh: connect to host <hostname> port 22: No route to host\r\n", "unreachable": true}
body.p: This error indicates that the configuration of the network interface of the virtual machine was not successful.

This error was seen with the VM running version 10.1.5.59732 (build-5055683) of the VMware tools and Red Hat 7.4. It was not reproduced with version 10.1.10.63510 (build-6082533) of the VMware tools plus Red Hat 7.5. As a result, we recommend that you update your Linux RG template to Red Hat 7.5 which will also upgrade the VMware tools if they were installed.
